website_summaries.verdict: A durable, dependable system with several bonus features, such as WiFi access and night mode.
pros: Nearly silent inside and very quiet outside
Comes with remote but can also interface with your phone over WiFi
cons: Most customers recommend hiring a professional to install

website_summaries.verdict: The PIONEER system is very quiet and energy efficient – a top-notch system at a great price.
pros: Comes in a package with everything (except tools) you need for the install
Includes a remote control with an LED readout that is simple to use
Has a heat pump unit for colder weather
LED temperature display on the interior unit
cons: While this kit does come with install instructions, the setup can be tricky and might be best installed by a professional

customer_reviews.title: Excellent HAVC Powerful (mistake not pre charged)
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed the 18000 downstairs in our 1,700' log cabin, to test. He wishes he ordered the 24000 it works so well, instant heat or air. We are putting a 13000 upstairs. These are excellent, we are putting them in our rentals and Hunting Lodge on the East Coast. The only issue is these are not pre charged. Amazon is so great, they paid for a plumber to charge the lines, who cost $100 and it worked immediately.

customer_reviews.title: Hvac contractor said unit appeared to be good quality from other installations so I purchased this unit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased unit from Amazon. Hvac contractor said unit appeared to be good quality from other installations so I purchased this unit. After my hvac contractor installed the interior head has vacuum leak. Hvac installer tested under pressure and pressure will not hold. You can hear an air leak under pressure inside the head. Tried to contact manufacture about sending new head and customer service is poor. Got hung up on twice and nobody is returning my call. Sending entire unit back to amazon. If replacement unit has problem I will get my money back and purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: matt mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Had a good AC man look at it and it just will ...
customer_reviews.text: Having trouble with it. Had a good AC man look at it and it just will not work right. Tried to a hold of someone to cover the warranty work but just get the run around. Like to return it but again no help. The mini spilt is just two months old and only worked for three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sychowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cold!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my central A/C totally sucked. It ran all day as well as running up my electric bill without lowering the temperature. After only 5 minutes the temp cooled off nearly 10 degrees and within 20 minutes to perfection. And my electric bill went from $110 down to $29.
customer_reviews.author: Deanareno

customer_reviews.title: Quality, didn't come charged propery due to defect
customer_reviews.text: Product came defective. There was & still is a leak. When vacuumed indoor line w/ high-side valve closed as per instruction i noticed a problem (liquid in vac). When i opened valve there was no release of gas into unit. After adding a few lbs of gas there was a low pressure error. After completely refueling unit & checking for installation leaks it worked but the unit needs to be recharged every 4-6 weeks, so there is still an original internal leak or problem w/ outdoor unit that hasn’t been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Corey S.

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer and warranty company no help in getting unit to function for first time
customer_reviews.text: Bought in May for our cabin but didn’t install until early November due to project timelines. Since the very first run, cold air works but no heat. Although we’ve had several technicians out (paid out of pocket) and spoke with customer service and the warranty company on several occasions, we’ve been told that since there is no error code showing, we are out of options and out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: When my Sanyo C1812 split ductless outdoor condensing unit from 1990 finally failed due to a locked compressor, my local HVAC contractor recommended a Mitsubishi unit for several thousand dollars. He agreed to install this Pioneer instead and remarked at the quality of the unit and installation kit. He was skeptical that the lines came charged from the factory and gave me a discount after confirming that they were during installation. It is faster, quieter and better in every way! Pioneer acknowledged receipt of the warranty card with test results and installer license number in case any problems are encountered (so far so good after six months).
customer_reviews.author: bjmsam

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier!
customer_reviews.text: The kit was delivered in two days and in perfect condition because the packaging is made to protect this unit while being shipped in a truck. I installed it on our first 90° day and my garage was at 72° within 45 minutes. I took my time and spent about 12 hours on the project. It is so quiet I thought it wasn’t working. I have refrigeration and heating experience but I believe average handyman or gal can install this unit if you follow all of the instructions to the letter.
customer_reviews.author: Summerville

customer_reviews.title: Great AC unit
customer_reviews.text: Great AC unit. Easy enough to install it yourself. Very detailed instructions included. Looks great inside and outside of the house. Noise is very minimum from indoor and outdoor units. Note for do it yourself installers. Besides the obvious: vacuum pump and set of gauges and vacuum hoses you will need to have proper R410 adapter for air evacuation. AC unit has 5/16 flare service port, while most of the hardware for R22 refrigerant is 1/4. Make sure adapter has Schrader Valve depressor and shut off valve. Search for Adapter R410a, R134a, R22 (5/16"f Flare) X (1/4" M SAE) with Shut Off Valve.
customer_reviews.author: Karpol

customer_reviews.title: repairable
customer_reviews.text: the unit was installed and started to leak repair man said it cannot be fixed...repairable...when the unit runs on cool it leaks a lot...when we first got the unit we ran it on heat no problem until we put it on cool ...said there is a fracture in the unit and cannot be fixed needs to be replaced
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Czulewicz

customer_reviews.title: I recently had my Air Conditioner Inverter+ Ductless Wall Mount ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently had my Air Conditioner Inverter+ Ductless Wall Mount Mini Split System installed and the technician performed a pressure test to check for leaks and discovered that the indoor unit has a leak in the coils. The refrigerant lines will not hold pressure due to the leak. The technician is from air tech, a company that specializes in ductless systems. I had to have the air conditioner uninstalled. Im trying to contact the company to have my unit replaced since I have warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Melgar

customer_reviews.title: Easy install but have a licensed hvac co. Run a system test
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars based on my experience thus far. I ordered unit 5/14/18 received it on 5/22 and installed it on 5/24. Unit came packed well with all parts present. I installed the unit myself and then had my licensed hvac guy do a system startup for me. He pressure tested it, vacuumed the lines and then released the freon into system. It's been 3 days, unit run well. Time will tell now if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: kungfujoe

customer_reviews.title: After my husband called the manufacturer he was told that sometimes the plug to the fan is not connected properly so after he located that it was about 1/8 inch loose and he pushed it together and now it is working great. So if any of you have this problem ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered this in August and had to wait on the installer to come to the house. Finally got it installed this weekend and the fan motor would not turn so the compressor would not run. We were really unhappy as we live in the country and it would be difficult to return it. After my husband called the manufacturer he was told that sometimes the plug to the fan is not connected properly so after he located that it was about 1/8 inch loose and he pushed it together and now it is working great. So if any of you have this problem you can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: ro guess

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer Split System
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Less than half the price of an LG or Mitsibushi. I hung the unit, drilled the hole to the outside, ran the high voltage line to the disconnect and set the condensing unit. I found a HVAC tech looking for some side work and for $200 he ran the lineset and pumped down the system. He said he was familiar with Pioneer and said it's just as good as the name brand units. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: TomTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and the packaging was very good. You are required to be home and sign for this. Installed the unit myself except for vacuum pumping the lines and charging system. I hired a install guy for this and he also recommended taking the line set joints apart and adding a sealer which we did. My installer could not get the unit going immediately and luckily he was here because he ended up finding an internal connection on the condenser unit which was loose and prevented communication between the head unit and condenser. The unit is very quiet and has functioned quite well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst product with an even worse warranty
customer_reviews.text: Installed for less than 5 months, have had it serviced three times, and now the compressor is bad. Not only will you pay for all labor under the warranty (which I know is standard) but you'll also pay to ship the parts and then more labor to install them. We have spent more on installation and additional service calls than we paid for the unit. We will never buy from this company again. Junk. Update. August 2020. Now there is an EC error on the unit which indicates a refrigerant leak. Anyone who is thinking about buying this unit should run from it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: This was such an easy install, literally anyone could do it
customer_reviews.text: This was such an easy install, literally anyone could do it. The unit blows ICE cold air and it is so quiet it doesn't interfere with TV or sleep. I would highly recommend this especially for a smaller home, it cools my entire first floor, which is about 800 square feet. I live in an old farmhouse, so my livingroom, library and kitchen are separated by doorways, and this cools all room and the unit is placed in my livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: sherry hendershot

customer_reviews.title: Not cooling
customer_reviews.text: I had it installed professionally and spend another $500.00 for reinstalling again because it leaked from the wall connector. Flare was not done properly in the first time from manufacture. I tried to get sellers attention but they were not helpful. Instruction do not tell you step by step exactly what others do. I made so many attempts to contact pioneer and no luck. There is always someone answering the phone, how ever is wrong person, sales, or freight company but costumer service. for $900.00 better of if you go with Mr Cool, such easier and simple explanations. I can't return my because it is too late but I can by MrCool for sure.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Bought the house with room that just wouldn’t cool down in the summer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely changed the quality of living in my house. Bought the house with room that just wouldn’t cool down in the summer. Excessively had to run main unit to cool room and rest of the house. Now, this split system cools the room and makes my whole house more comfortable. For clarity, I tried everything else: replaced windows, added ceiling insulation, added cross through ventilation, and installed second air return. The split system was the solution that made it all work!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and working great in the heat of Arizona
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this unit for 3 years in Arizona with temps up to 115 degrees in the summer and it works fantastic. A few slight hissing and warm up noises sometimes as it turns on, but otherwise super quiet and efficient. Love it and really happy we went with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, then didn't, then couldn't get support.
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked well until it didn't. No biggie (or so I thought). Called an HVAC guy to take a look and he said it looked there was an issue with the compressor. Reached out to customer and have heard nothing for almost 6 months. Reached out to them several times and still nothing. Sent pictures and video of the problem to their tech support line. Still nothing. It was great until it wasn't. I really wish I had been able to use it longer than 2 months. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I installed the inside unit and outside unit with the idea of having an hvac company doing the final hookup. We called over 15 companies and even asked for a recommendation through Amazon from the company that we bought the unit. No one was interested and even the recommended companies said they had no connections with the seller. We did find someone and are extremely happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Best advice is to purchase elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three years insurance and all they want me to do is to take it to a nearby shop instead of replacing it after spending to get a technician to repair it twice out of my own pockets. For items like these purchase them at Best Buy instead their insurance is way better. Buying it through here isn’t cheap and the insurance isn’t any good. I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Quit working when I tried to turn the heat on
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome in cool mode. Totally quit working when I switched to heat mode and no diagnostic info describes what is going on with it. Probably fried a computer chip that was faulty. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe OConnor

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome unit so far !!! had a heating /air handler buddy install for reasons of warranty ?? unit is super quiet , cools and dehumidifies awesome , used the heat side last fall couple times and could feel it immediately.... hardly noticed the electric bill change from running .... cant say enough about this so far !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Early.  Easier to install than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived in 4 days. About 3 hours install, which counts removing the old one. COLD!! Quiet. Watch the Youtube videos. Get the Vacuum Port Adapter. You'll need it. (Pioneer Ductless Mini Split System Charging Vacuum Port Adapter Swivel Type, 5/16 Female, 1/4 Male SAE) My wife thinks I'm "The Man".
customer_reviews.author: Boss

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the flares fittings properly sealed
customer_reviews.text: Leaked after installation. The mistake was not getting the flare fittings to seal. Mistakes: 1. Not knowing how much torque to use. Should have used a torque wrench. Turns out that I used too little torque. 2. Using plumbers tape to seal the threads. The threads do NOT need sealing. The seal is at the flare joint. 3. Not lubricating the back of the flare. Add a little engine oil to the back of the flare (not the joint). This makes it easier for the nut to turn
customer_reviews.author: kentishsue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: 5-star review based on the quality of the customer support. When my HVAC installer wired up my 110/120 volt unit, he wired it up to a 220/240 volt line and blew up the power board in the compressor. I reached out to the seller, they helped me figure out what had happened, and mailed me a new power board free of charge. Unit now works great. Impressed that they went above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: The remote for this unit has less functionality than the cheaper 9000 BTU version
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these over the last year. The remote for the 9000 BTU unit has far more functionality including scheduled off / on, disabling the led and more. It's also more powerful. The remote for the 18000 btu unit can control mode and temperature only, it's range is also terrible and many times you have to hit the button many times. I thought maybe it has less functionality, but after testing the 9000 BTU remote remote on the 18000 BTU unit they have the same functionality. I would like to know why the more expensive unit comes with a worse remote.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Unit is not working and Techsupport was clueless
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS UNIT!!! Bad product and horrible support. I'm more than upset with this purchase. The unit was working for a couple days and then failed. It unit is freezing after a few hours. I called Techsupport and they just told me they cannot help me because the unit was purchased 45 days ago and not in their 30 day window. Pretty bad AMAZON...not a way to do business at all. Now I have a $950 unit that worked for a few hours with an extended warranty which is not getting honored...way to go Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Danube

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my garage to make it a more pleasant work space. Garage is a little over 600 sq ft. Pulls the humidity out quickly. Very little noise output. Does a great job cooling. I haven't tried the heat function yet but if it's anything like the cooling then it will be amazing. Turned a storage room into a workplace!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Pibb

customer_reviews.title: CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would give a zero star. This product itself have givin problem after problem the entire time we have had it. This is suppose to be for my 10 yr old daughters room and I shouldnt be complaing about a product I spent $800 on!! Complete crap! Valves do not keep refrigerant full. Continue leakage. Continuous noise from compressor days after installing!! Please dont buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney White

customer_reviews.title: Bought September 2016, Stopped working today -- June 2019 ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was not bad... ran well when it worked... but 2 1/2 years and it stars leaking and makes a noise now? Very disappointing. Won't buy this brand again after this experience... BTW, we hardly used this... my friend had a Mitsubishi for over a decade and ran it nonstop. I don't think this is under warranty. You lost a good customer Pioneer
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: The 2 year mini split... after that its going to crash.
customer_reviews.text: we have multiple commercial properties and for the first round of mini split installations on nearly all locations we used pioneers, this 9000 btu was used for 5 different offices. Before 3 years of use, all of them had crashed (something expensive like circuit boards or internal Freon leak). Had multiple trips from HVAC team and all warranties were 2 year. We went to daikin and have been happy ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing.  Economical and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Using this in my 900 sq ft garage/workshop. Stays as warm as i want in the winter and cool in the summer. Low cost of operation. Very small increase in my electric bill after installation. Use it year round. Even on days of extreme temps it has no problem maintaining the set temperature. It has been 0F a couple of days had no problem keeping up. Last summer had 85% humid days in the high 90s and the humidity in the garage was 50% and 75deg. I did add extra insulation in the garage so the heat wouldn't jut go out the roof. Its so great being able to work comfortably. I love this unit. Probably needs professional installation.
customer_reviews.author: voip

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Great Company!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased 2 of these units for a small house I remodeled this past spring/summer. This was the first time I attempted to install anything like this, and it proved to be quite simple. The instructions were excellent and the product fantastic. This company proved to be very professional and stood by their product after damage was discovered to the inside units that occurred during transit. HighSEER replaced the damaged units using nothing but e-mail correspondence. I definitely recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O.

customer_reviews.title: The hardest part is boring the 2
customer_reviews.text: I install it myself. The hardest part is boring the 2.5 inch hole through the wall. Once you have the necessary tools, it is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Tech Support is great!
customer_reviews.text: I just worked with Luis from tech support. He was prompt and courteous and called me back after I got my tools in order. He helped me troubleshoot an outside unit not powering up. My son installed the inside unit and I did the outside unit. He got he green and black wires crossed inside. After I fixed that it came on right away. The outside unit is sooo quiet! It's amazing. I am very happy with the ease of installation and the professional handling tech support. I will buy a few more of these in the future for our other buildings on site.
customer_reviews.author: Russell 50 in TX

customer_reviews.title: Warranty beware
customer_reviews.text: Warning, foo not buy from Highseer. If there is an issue they will not cover labor, only ship you a part (as a guess) and charge you shipping. Look at the warranty on the item. Square Trade does not kick in until after 30 days. Before that your screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Long awaited A/C
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, delivery from FL to NY took 2 weeks so set schedule accordingly. Well packaged and I had also ordered wall brackets and line channel cover kit to complete installation. Installation went well and now to see how well product performs. I am in the market for additional units, and so far would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: OKS

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding unit! Ordered this unit to provide heat/cooling for room addition. The installation went without a hitch using provided documentation. Not for the "average" DIYer though as proper installation does require use of flaring tool (if line set needs adjusting, vacuum pump (to remove any residual moisture after connection and to verify connections by checking vacuum readings over time), and a set of manifold gauges. Make sure to take note where the inside unit is to be mounted so that line set/electrical/drain line hole may be properly located. Once installed, the unit runs very quiet and does exceptional job of keeping space cool.
customer_reviews.author: RICK

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just as the add says. All components included and easy to install. You need to get the bracket for the condenser outside. I installed the inside unit and the outside unit in about 1 hour and then the lines and had vacuum on the system in another 1 1/2 hours. Once that sat and no issues I open the valves and within 5 hours of installing this system, my shop was cooling down. Great product and easy to install. I will be getting another unit soon just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jathuron

customer_reviews.title: Go BIG or go home
customer_reviews.text: My 12000 BTU unit was recommended for a room up to 450 sq.ft. This unit doe NOT heat or cool my 400 sq.ft. room. I had high hopes for this, but turned out disappointed. I posted a question how to contact the seller, but have not heard any response. Maybe choose a unit 3 times larger than what recommendation states??? I wish we did. Maybe it would've worked properly for us. This summer my unit is working overtime which is causing it to freeze up.
customer_reviews.author: K. March

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews and waited to see how this unit performed before considering a review. The unit didn’t last 2 1/2 years from install. After several hundred dollars of troubleshooting, the outdoor coil was found to have a leak. The technician verified that it was not due to damage. The technician and owner of the HVAC company both independently advised they had seen this problem with Pioneer systems before. So basically, it’s junk and I would not recommend wasting tour money like I did. The only option from the manufacturer is to buy a replacement outdoor unit, not putting anymore money into this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ) It is absolutely wonderful. No problems
customer_reviews.text: I had it professionally installed in 6 hours (including going through a brick wall for the tubes, wires, etc.) It is absolutely wonderful. No problems. One of the flanges had to be redone, but the AC guy said that is common. He has installed many of these units. It is for our 800 sq ft. garage and is perfect. It keeps it cool easily. It is also very quiet. I couldn't be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: D. Land

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have a professional finish up
customer_reviews.text: So quiet inside, also the outside unit is so quiet you barely know it’s working. Definitely a whole different ballgame over a window unit. I installed the inside and outside units and had a hvac buddy hook up the lines. He shortened the lines for a custom fit, pulled a vacuum on the lines and inside unit, released nitrogen into it so as not to suck the oil out of the compressor upon vacuum release and generally did a professional job. I’m a diy guy but recommend a pro for finishing up the job. We are into the high 90’s now and no problem keeping it nice and cool.
customer_reviews.author: jlor

customer_reviews.title: Decent for A/C, terrible for heat.
customer_reviews.text: A/C portion works pretty decently, but the heat portion does not work at all. Just sucks energy, and blows less than room temp air into my house. Considering how it does this even in 70 degree weather, and I bought the mini-split solely for that purpose (heating/cooling) I am pretty unhappy. I feel as though I wasted over $1500 with the install included. I suppose, if I only wanted it for A/C I might be happy.. well, I take that back.. for the cost I would still be pretty pissed off. I mean, this is a 700sq ft. space we are talking about here.. not the Taj Mahal.
customer_reviews.author: USMC Vet.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Cools like a pro and warms us when we need. Has a little outside noise but there is no inside noise at all. Hard to tell it's on its so quiet. Will def order again when we add an addition to our home. Update: Was only able to use the heat a couple of months before it no longer worked. Not sure what happened. It only got down in the low 50's that night, temp was set to 68 for heat and noticed that the outside fins had frozen up. After that it hasn't worked. AC still works like a pro.
customer_reviews.author: l.grhm

customer_reviews.title: Was not precharged
customer_reviews.text: Unit doesn't function properly, was supposed to be recharged but was not, required 3 cans refrigerant the first repair visit. After a huge ($480) install bill it still won't heat adequately and it isn't even below freezing out. Repair man returning today - we will see!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Yelvington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Self installed in my garage and its simply amazing. I frequently think it shut off, its that quiet. Only been running for a week but its a game changer in Florida! Wish i hadnt dragged my heels for so long. Routing the copper line set was laborious but not complicated. Unit is also pre charged. I believe most if not all are. Description doesnt sell that fact. You only need a simple gauge set and a vacuum pump to get running, not a massive hvac installers bill.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Best Value; Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This unit is so quiet, and it works perfectly. I had to get a professional to help me install because I didn't get a fitting closed tightly enough so I don't know if it's completely DIY. The instructions say you need to pull a vacuum, but I've installed them before without it, unfortunately I ruined my chance to test this unit! Cost me $100 to fill it with refrigerant and it is the best unit I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Unit that looks good on paper
customer_reviews.text: The unit preformed well but died a day after the warranty expired exactly a year plus a day to purchase! Tried to call the company and was disconnected three times in a raw. Impossible to reach them on the phone. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS UNIT
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jakob

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable System
customer_reviews.text: I've had a person out twice to fix it since I had it installed. The coolant is leaking again. Each time the guy says that since Pioneer's are using the Inverter system they are unreliable and more expensive to have fixed. I'm basically going to have to buy a new one. It's a good looking system and it's not that difficult to install yourself, but basically all the HVAC guys that keep coming by say that it's not a great purchase as far as minisplits go.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley J. Browning

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and very efficient!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!! First, it’s BEYOND quiet when it’s running!!! You can’t hear the inside unit or the outside unit at all!! We have it heating a 2+ car garage that’s below ground, temp set at 72 and it runs a LOT but my electric bill did not change!! The electrician and heating/AC guys who we had install it were very impressed at the quality and amount of heat it produced during testing. These guys said we purchased well and I agree!! A warm garage for little to no change in electric!!
customer_reviews.author: Loree

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about this item
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this item! This is the 3rd one for our mountain home. Getting ready to purchase a 4th one for our VA home!
customer_reviews.author: MuttiDawn

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This thing is worth every penny I installed it myself with no problems I ordered a 30ft line kit so that I could hang the outside unit on the back wall right above my standard unit. My standard unit has not came on since installation of my pioneer 18,000 btu ductless a/c it keeps my whole upstairs 70* now and you can stand at the bottom of the stairs and feel the cold air coming down.... I love it.
customer_reviews.author: dl133

customer_reviews.title: I am a contractor do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it working it’s bad do not buy one one thing after another The install and service trips is more then the cost of the system
customer_reviews.author: CWG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cool or heat right
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my garage which I was using as my art studio. Unfortunately,it didn’t do the job right. Didn’t cool in summer and didn’t heat in winter. I sold it for very cheap just to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Reem

customer_reviews.title: Be forewarned about buying additional parts!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate immensely how quiet the unit is when it is running. Close to silent. Just a light breeze sound emanating from it. I hired someone to install the unit; and they seemed to set it up and have it running within a few hours. Although, I did have to pay over $100 for additional parts that were not included when buying this unit from Amazon. (So, be for-warned that you may have to buy additional items to get it running. Otherwise, I’m happy with the purchase! It’s perfect for cooling and heating my 612 sq ft cottage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash find something else maybe different brand
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. I have bought 3 of these units and they are have to be charged yearly. One of the 3 units don't even work at all anymore.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 3rd bay garage
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to put in our almost finished 3rd bay garage for my daughter. We had it installed by a handyman and it is fantastic. Super quiet and cools and heats super quickly. We did end up having an AC guy come charge it for us but it’s a personal preference. It has an option to rotate the air flow or keep it steady. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kardarira

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet, gets used for about an hour a day and so far everything works well. (Sometimes during weekend may run all day). Have not noticed that my electric bill has gone up at all. During heat of summer in Texas (100 plus degrees) with this unit on 70 it will bring my garage down to about 75-78 within an hour which feels like your walking into a freezer. My garage is 24’x24’ no insulation in walls but I did blow in the attic. I would not say your average “do it yourselfer” could install with no help, but you can do 90% by yourself and minimize the amount of money you may have to pay a HVAC contractor.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner cools our 400 sq foot Airbnb. Guest love the ease of adjusting their own temperature and we bought the add on that allows us to control the temperature remotely, so we can adjust the thermostat when nobody is there. Super quiet and functional. You’d never know it’s there. It was easy to install in an afternoon. Having the use of the window again is also nice. Goodbye window AC!
customer_reviews.author: RN GinnyG

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a quality unit with some potential issues
customer_reviews.text: Had leak on lowside service valve. Could not pull a vacuum because of it to finish installation. Called manufacturer who was extremely quick to blame user error for a manufacturing defect. Waiting to see if they will will stand behind the product. Other then a faulty valve it seems like a good unit. Tech support is in India and quite rude.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product purchased 2
customer_reviews.text: Great product purchased 2 . Super quiet inside but year and a half later both units have fan noises. Inside fan motors all speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A warm house is a good thing....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (for our electrician) and I am so far enjoying the heat these guys put out. We have a two story house so we got 1 unit for each for level. I did notice that our electrician had to call an HVAC to come out and help out with the AC part of this unit. I didn't ask if that is normal or not.
customer_reviews.author: barb polzel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: AFTER TWO YEARS IT. IS BREAKING DOWN ALREADY!!!!!! COMPRESSOR PROBLEM AND THEY WILL ONLY SEND PARTS, NO AFTER MARKET SERVICE. I HAVE TO PAY TO HAVE IT FIXED WHEN THEY SHOULD BE RESPONSIBLE FOR DEFECTIVE PARTS!!!! NEVER BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: It's defective
customer_reviews.text: So it came, installed by hvac contractor, it's defective, needs a new board in the outdoor unit
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: so far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit to heat up & cool a bonus room. With the help of my 13 year-old, we completed the installation. I did call a pro to connect the lines though. Not hard to do if you watch a couple of YouTube videos. So far it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Morales

customer_reviews.title: Poor design/customer service
customer_reviews.text: Like the unit but there is one flaw in the design as the drain pipe is directly on the bottom of unit. The feet arent long enough and it protrudes past them. Delivered 3 days late. Seller not customer oriented. Would recommend buying from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: darling dexter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product / Easy Install / Works beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The product came shipped from Florida and it was delivered on time. The shipper was very helpful because I was not home only my wife. Installing the unit was easy enough after watching you tube videos. It was simple and straight forward. I do think you need some knowledge about installing the electricity, but it is definitely a do it yourself project. The only thing I would like to see is that PIONEER adds this unit to it, you need it to get the vacuum. PIONEER Air Conditioner Ductless Mini Split System charging vacuum port adapter, Converts new R410a style 5/16 SAE service ports to accept older 1/4 SAE gauge hoses.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaE

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and cool. Needed replacement parts within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: quite and cool, self installed except for the final line evacuation and connection which required a pro; bending of the tubes is a pain if you're not familiar with it.. buuuuttttt FYI - one of the communication cables quit out just 2 weeks into operation.. tech support indicated it to be a faulty control board, which they sent a replacement by mail (ordered on a Monday, received on Friday). After installation, still no fix, tech support narrowed the problem to a faulty communication cable. They also sent a replacement under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Finally installed...
customer_reviews.text: I took my sweet time installing this thing, it ended up being somewhat easier than I thought. So far (3 days) it works great and keeps my huge bedroom at the perfect temp.
customer_reviews.author: Cormac

customer_reviews.title: That someone will unaware or contact me
customer_reviews.text: Now that it's start to be hot in FLORIDA and we need the A/C it's not working properly. It got stock on 69 degree and we cant set it on any other temperature. An A/C technician came and said it is the problem with the remote. We bout a new remote and it doesn't help, still the same problem. Please contact me via phone# 305-527-4845 or email: shper770@gmail.com. Stay safe & Healty, Ruth-Linda Chiperling
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very very quiet. Impressed with how quiet they are. Can barley hear the indoor unit. And the outside one is very quiet too. Not as efficient of a Mitsubishi but a good grand less$$ so I say they're well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Ethan M Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Extremely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised on how quiet the unit is. Both the inside & outside unit are unbelievably quiet! It cools a converted garage 12 x 16 foot room off really quickly & keeps it cool at an affordable price. I can’t be more happy with my purchase. The only thing that is a negative was it is slightly more difficult to install than was assumed. The product is of high quality but I would recommend a professional installer for the average person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty equipment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pioneer mini split ac unit from parker davis from Florida. Problem was with the indoor unit; next a bigger headache was not flowing cold air. After 3 technicians, leaking at the service port and parker davis. They said they cannot replace it. Overall customer service is poor and product is even more poorer. We live in Arizona. I will never buy another pioneer ac from parker davis.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Harkins

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE
customer_reviews.text: This machine is still not working properly. First of all this is not a "do it yourself" product. You need a technician to do it. Second, it has to be tested by a professional to make sure there's no air in the tube, there's enough freon and the valves are working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Money waisted and time bad investment
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waist your money and time on this unit my first one had head problems leaking Freon they sent another one one week later compressor problems loud noise I live in a 30 ft travel trailer in the Blythe ca area 116 this unit hardly cools down the main living room area I’m so up set it’s this peace of crap don’t buy pioneer if you have to deal with the real heat of summer
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: The ac unit itself is excellent. It does exactly as advertised. Installation was easy and the instructions were adequte. We have had this unit installed for over a year now in southeastern Ohio. it works well in both winter and summer it raised my bill about 20$ in the peak heating and cooling seasons. My only reservation is that the remote isn’t the best quality. It had malfunctioned 3 times in the past year and a half but all I have to do to fix it is remove the batteries and replace them.
customer_reviews.author: lisa theiss

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with having to deal with a warranty issue on ...
customer_reviews.text: Got unit in and installed but the outside unit wobbles badly because the fan is either unbalanced or damaged. Not happy with having to deal with a warranty issue on a new unit. It does cool well but the wobble will shake the unit apart. Will update when I find out a resolution. *Update* Talked with selling company and they plan to send a replacement part so I can do a replacement. Will update again once repaired. 06-13-2018 New fan arrived and the install was simple. Now unit runs smoothly and cools great. 5 stars for good product and quick service.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love how quiet this air conditioner is. My ac man wasn’t sure it was even running. The installation takes some time but once it is up and running, it’s great. Buy the adapter for charging it because you will need it. Even my ac guy didn’t have one. I don’t know why it isn’t included with every sale.
customer_reviews.author: kaky

customer_reviews.title: Tech Support - Two thumbs up to Luis!
customer_reviews.text: As stated earlier, getting the unit to me was painful, once installed, we had a P4 error. Luis at tech support was incredible. We checked everything. He was very patient and to the point. Once we determined the PCB was bad, I received another one in 2 days, on a Sunday (today!), and that was over Thanksgiving holiday. It was a plug and play board, and it's nicely warming my home as intended. My hat's off to Luis at tech support. Thank you, brother!
customer_reviews.author: Dregischan

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to Arizona monsoons
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit a year and a half ago. Outstanding equipment. My handyman and helper installed it in a small 2 story shed I converted to a sewing room and exercise bike. Cooling capability is perfect in Arizona heat. The heating portion takes a little longer to warm this space but it is adequate. Compact, unit is mounted outside in monsoons and summer with no problems to date.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wow..so easy to install, especially when your neighbor is an A/C guy. But we did it in less than 3 hours from unboxing to unit running and cooling room. Extremely quiet, been told very energy efficient, we will see on our 1st bill next month. Temps are running 106F this week, so it will be a good test. Very pleased so far. Thanks Pioneer
customer_reviews.author: Judy T.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We just bought our house and there was no air conditioning so when the hot summer came we were dying. We quickly bought this and a family electrician helped us install (don’t install by yourself if you don’t know what you’re doing). Our house cools down within minutes, we have an open floor plan on the first floor and the entire floor cools the same temperature. And once we had problems with the furnace in the winter, the heating option saved us!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Watt

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipping, still waiting on replacement 16 days later.
customer_reviews.text: Indoor unit arrived with a huge gash puncture through the bottom of the box, breaking a grill and denting the cooling coils. Also, delivery service placed compressor on it's end, even though clearly marked on the box to place the top side up. I was unable to try the units due to this. Bummer, because I was really excited to do so. This is not a Pioneer problem, it's an AMAZON direct problem!! I have been waiting for over two weeks for a replacement unit. This has caused me issues with the Plumber I had lined up to do the install. And I'm still waiting...................
customer_reviews.author: Clay B.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: These things are an absolute waste of money I have two of these units in my house for the first year they worked great but after that nothing but problems tech support keeps saying parts are on back order and both units are now broken waited 3 months on parts for the first unit that broke... and it is now on the fritz agian ...2nd unit now compressor is bad
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Ships with known defect in indoor fan motor
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 2 months before getting an E3 error code. Turns out that the indoor motor malfunction is a known issue and the company quickly sent another motor which then proceeded to malfunction as well. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lee

customer_reviews.title: Wow, amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our son installed 2 of these for us. Super quiet, very nice units. We walked into our house this morning and with one unit running the house was super cool! You can barely hear anything when it’s running.I so happy with this!!
customer_reviews.author: JDV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fantastic purchase for us. I saw energy savings in the first month, it runs quiet, and the room is ice cold. When it is cold outside it keeps the room nice and toasty. I highly recommend this product. When installing, unless you have the proper power outlet already, please consult an electrician. Also, you may want to consult an AC tech in order to properly install the system if you are not savvy with installing mini splits.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well. Really happy for how cool it makes my garage 22 feet by 24 feet. Weather here gets up above 100 often and this thing works well. Was quoted for 5k and the guy recommended insulation. I did not end up insulating it.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl Glacier

customer_reviews.title: the exit direction of the copper pipes from evaporation units
customer_reviews.text: we are using these units to replace the existing heat pump( with duck) in the apartment we manage these units serve well in terms of energy, noise etc. We could take another 50 to 60 units this project. We encounter a major difficulty in installation of compression pipes (16 ft). these pipes exit the evaporation unit only at one side. these is not easy way to bent to the opposite direction. If these is way to do that please let us know ASAP. Also, there are different lengths available such as 12ft, 20 ft
customer_reviews.author: james yen

customer_reviews.title: The best thousand dollars I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful and very well designed machine. I'm handy so was able to install it myself with the help of a friend in one afternoon. It's super quiet inside and out, energy efficient and a bonus is smart home integration. 18000 BTU cools a 450 sqft room with a 13' high ceiling and lots of windows + another 425 sqft room on a lower level. Our ductless home is finally comfortable, even on 95 degree days! The instructions are a little lacking but that's my only criticism. I would recommend Pioneer Mini-Splits to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience.
customer_reviews.text: So far I got the first unit in, hooked it up, had cold air for 3 mins, called customer service and found out I had a defective unit and that they would send a new one, waited 2 weeks (take into consideration, ITS FRIGGN HOT, WHOLE REASON I BOUGHT THE THING) ,just got the new one in the mail, it is about 3x smaller than my original one. So I now am waiting AGAIN, for the new one to be brought to my house!.... AGAIN. So, hopefully, by winter I'll have AC... -_-
customer_reviews.author: AstroCHOKES

customer_reviews.title: Worh the investment!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my unit back 2018, and finally got it installed a week ago. I took so long because the install was pricey ($2650). Work great! Cools (also does heat) off my entire bedroom suite (700sq feet). I strongly suggest to get installed by a professional HVAC installer. I believe people who experience issues with these units Is when they install it themselves..
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: The best Ac unit ever 10 star.!
customer_reviews.text: Is the best Ac unit by far, cooling very well in the summer, and heating well in the winter, also bought wifi board and I hooked up to my wifi and controlling the temperature when I'm not home. Just amazing product what can I say.
customer_reviews.author: citi

customer_reviews.title: Will not last, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Works great for year, i am professional ac guy, i know i installed it correctly. It was for my rental unit. I bough 2 units, both faild within a year. PCB issue, possible compressor. Tech support give you run around. DO NOT BUY IT!! i am going to buy from different manufacturer and with out the inverter.
customer_reviews.author: Georgeusa

customer_reviews.title: No support from AMAZON  poor service
customer_reviews.text: Cheep unit do not buy no support from Amazon I had nothing but problems no help SHAME ON AMAZON I paid an AC company to install never worked right just got scammed for 703.00 it’s junk
customer_reviews.author: William Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Warranty Issue
customer_reviews.text: Purchased unit on July 1, 2019 and installed yesterday. Today I noticed water running down the interior wall. I called tech support and they told me a board was probably bad and transferred me to their warranty division. I was told by warranty it was probably a cracked case or a loose hose. I asked who to call to have repaired. Was told that was up to me. I have purchased 4 from this dealer but this will be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pioneer Air Conditioner Pioneer Mini Split Heat Pump Minisplit Heatpump 12000 BTU-208/230 V
product_meta.description: Size:12000 BTU - 208/230 VFor full technical specks and other Information, Please refer to the highseer web site. Pioneer newest ways series wall mount mini split ductless Inverter air conditioning and heat pump system. Full system set, containing indoor section, outdoor section, remote controller and standard installation accessories. With a Pioneer ductless mini split type air conditioning system, it is possible to heat or cool any contiguous area, quietly, effectively and efficiently. Pioneer brand ways series ductless split heat pump systems come in a range of capacities; from 9000 BTU/hour to 36000 BTU/hour. Ways is an Inverter system with variable speed compressor, providing very high efficiency levels. Included wireless remote digital controller allows the users easily select among the 4 operating modes; cooling, heating, dehumidification and ventilation. Additionally, an automatic switchover mode is available for totally automatic operation through it's on board computer. A timer function allows the user to set the system to start or stop running at a certain time. Night mode function automatically adopts the temperature settings to the naturally changing body temperature levels during the night. Auto restart function memorizes all settings in case of a temporary power failure and restarts the system to continue running the same way after the power is reconnected. Cloud programmable wireless Internet remote access function is also available. Smart buyers choose Pioneer brand Inverter split systems for their top quality, reliability and performance, available at extremely affordable prices.
feature_bullets: Ultra high efficiency inverter+ ductless mini split heat pump system
Cooling capacity: 12, 000 BTU/H with 17.5 SEER efficiency
Heating capacity: 11, 800 BTU/H with 9.0 hspf efficiency
Voltage: 208~230 VAC, 60 hertz, 1 Phase (standard household 2 line power, l1-l2-g)
Please see the active links on this page for full specks, manuals, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,673 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Indoor Unit, Outdoor Unit, Installation Kit
